inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery

inclusion.criterion: NYHA classification II, III or ambulatory IV
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Currently participating in another clinical investigation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or nursing subjects and those who plan pregnancy during the clinical investigation follow up period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active endocarditis of the mitral valve
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, who was planned for a MV repair but was lost to follow-up.
